transcript:
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Haan, aarahe hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hi sir, good good morning, main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi thi, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Ji, ekdam badhiya. Sir aapke paas ek feedback aaya hoga, aapne not satisfy diya tha, usi ke liye mujhe aapse discussion karna tha.
Customer: Muskan madam baat kar rahi hai?
Executive: Nahi, main Muskan ki senior baat kar rahi hu sir.
Customer: Ji, ji, ji boliye na madam.
Executive: Sir actually kal aapki Muskan ke saath discussion hua hoga, right?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aur phir uske baad hamara feedback message kiya tha, us pe aapne not satisfy diya tha. Actually kya hai ki ji, ji, ji, madam actually kya hai mera ek mahine pehle renewal hua hai, Muskan ji ke saath maine conversation karke renew kiya hai, teen saal se main IndiaMART ka user hu, yeh fourth year running hai.
Executive: Okay sir.
Customer: Toh main chaar baar payment kar chuka hu madam, mujhe kuch worth nahi nikal raha hai IndiaMART se, is baar thoda sa mujhe laga ek baar aur dekhna chahiye, dedicated person bhi maine apne yaha hire kiya hua hai, uski salary alag deta hu ₹15000 mahine IndiaMART chalane ke liye.
Executive: Accha.
Customer: Toh mujhe Muskan ji dwara bataya gaya hai ki sir aap main aapka account ki setting kara denge, jo bhi hai aap kaha dikkat aa rahi hai, kaun se product mein kya hai aur photos upload kara denge, product ka score 100% jis type se jo jo kamiya hai woh dur ho jayegi, aap mere se connect kar lijiye. Main ek mahine 15-20 din se hamara jo employee hai woh connect kar rahe hai toh kabhi toh woh ek toh kya hai shayad mujhe lagta hai work from home kar rahe hai woh ghar se.
Executive: Haan, haan, haan.
Customer: Ji, toh mujhe nahi malum but unki jo gatividhiya hai aur jo activity hai usse samajh aa raha hai. Toh din bhar toh woh ghar mein lagi rehti hai proper time samay nahi. Main aapka team change kar deti hu. No, nahi nahi sir agar hamare client suffer kar rahe hai is wajah se, main ek kaam karti hu sir, I will change account manager, theek hai? Aapko main assign new account manager kar deti hu, woh aapke saath connect kar lete hai, isi number pe connect karna hai ya koi aur dekh dekh rahe hai sir?
Customer: Madam dusra number pe ek madam hai woh dekhti hai, main toh supervise supervision dekhta hu. Madam ka number de dijiye yeh kya sir?
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: Haan madam ka number de dijiye please.
Customer: 8910
Executive: Sorry?
Customer: 8910
Executive: 910
Customer: 9989
Customer: 9989
Executive: 102
Executive: Main inka repeat kar rahi hu sir number, 9109989102, theek hai?
Customer: Sorry madam 101 hai.
Executive: Sorry.
Customer: 101. 9109989101, theek hai inka naam kya hoga sir?
Executive: Correct. Nandini.
Executive: Nandini ji. No issue sir, main aapki na account manager miss Himani ko assign kar rahi hu ab aapko. Nandini ji ko Himani abhi connect kar leti hai agar woh free hongi abhi toh, theek hai?
Customer: Madam free hai woh dedicated isi ke liye hai woh unka subah working hour shuru hota hai 9:30 se 7 pm aur woh kabhi bhi call kijiye is working hour mein woh din bhar free.
Executive: No issue sir, main call kara leti hu, I am very very sorry aapko hamari taraf se itna challenge aaya first of all aur jo bhi changes. Ek mahine kharab ho gaya challenge ka kuch nahi madam ek mahine unke chakkar mein kharab ho gaya. Main abhi connect karti hu aaj chutti hai main ghar par hu. Madam aadhi baat toh suni nahi aapne meri kya hai. Mujhe halaki unki mujhe personal cheeze batane mein mujhe koi issue nahi hai but mujhe mera paisa doob raha hai mera maine paisa diya hua hai mere ko uska worth nahi mil raha hai bas.
Executive: Sir aap batayenge toh jyada accha rahega mere liye kyuki dekho sir hame bhi pata chalna chahiye ki aap work from home aap bhi jaan sakte ho main unko ghar se dekhne nahi ja rahi hu, right? Main unki command se. Woh nahi hota na unhone apna personal number de rakha hai unhone kaha hai is pe call hi nahi karna hai. Personal number pe jyada call karti hai unhone block kar diya jab woh block kiya tab woh kal aapke IVR number pe call kiya hai is wajah se aapke paas mere paas report bhi aa gayi satisfy ki. Personal number pe call karwati hai toh woh hota hi nahi hai.
Customer: Is type se kaam chal raha hai. Hame toh yeh complaint aapko ek mahine pehle deni thi hum bhi cooperate kar rahe hai chalo theek hai hoga abhi aaj chutti hai aaj main closing hai 31 October hai aaj 30 October hai ruk jaaiye ek 1 November ko shanivar hai 2 tarikh ko Sunday hai 3 ko main chutti par hu. Yeh kahani hote hote hote hote aaj 12 tarikh ho gayi hai. Pura samay nikal gaya ek mahine se upar ho gaya mujhe liye hue subscription mera nikalta ja raha hai mujhe koi worth nahi mil rahi meri koi account ki settings nahi hui hai. Aur toh aur aapke aage staff toh matlab main madam kya hi bolu aap jab mera naya onboarding hui thi dobara se recharge hua uske baad turant mujhe on call sir maine kaha madam abhi time nahi hai mere paas main drive kar raha hu. Mujhe aap connect mat kijiye nahi sir connect karna main aapke account mein setting karni hai aapke loop hole matlab bata raha hu main aapki company ke. Yeh sara online mere ko connect karwa diye sir aap hai na on call mera call utha ke chod dijiye aap aap driving kariye main apni setting kar leti hu aapki puri account ki setting kar dungi aur uske baad kuch nahi kiya sirf logo ko batane ke liye main main bhi company chala raha hu mujhe bhi pata hai kaha kaha kaise kaise hota hai. Toh CRM par pura aapko dikhane ke liye ki is client se 15 minute baat hui hai 20 minute baat hui hai aur phone rakha hua hai side mein pehle din ka kaam yeh hai. Recharge hone ke first call yeh thi. Is type ka is level is level ke aapne employee hire kari hue hai toh main isliye main IndiaMART dobara recharge nahi karwa raha tha ki mujhe malum hai sare employee main teen saal se main dekh chuka hu sab bewakoof banane ka khel chal raha hai aapke yaha pe logo ko kaise thago aur jaane do. I am so sorry for that sir, I will definitely take action of for that. Main abhi aapka account manager change karake Himani ko kar rahi hu pehla point, second point sir main aapka bhi ek whatsapp group bana rahi hu Himani ke saath jisme aap main aur aapki jo madam hai woh rahengi, theek hai? Toh aapko koi bhi problem hoti hai aap waha pe hame connect kar sakte hai, theek hai?
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: Madam API ka bhi mujhe bola hua tha. Woh theek hai banaaiye main kar leta hu.
Executive: API ka bhi kuch malum nahi.
Customer: Sir dekho API ke liye main bolna chahungi API hum log nahi dete hai. API aapka. Aap nahi dete hai toh aap jab main aap mujhse paisa le rahe the us samay aapko nahi comment karna chahiye. Mana kar dete nahi hoga. API comment dekho sir nahi main aapko batati hu API do tarike se hota hai ek tarike ek hota hai API ki aapke paas khud ka CRM hai aap usse hamara IndiaMART ka jo data hai transfer karna chah rahe hai through API, theek hai? Ek hota hai ki hamare lead manager se jaake ek apna pura data access karte hai toh hum log lead manager wala API dete hai sir jisme aap ek jagah pe hi apna call inquiry by lead sab access kar sakte hai. Wahi wahi main chah raha tha maine aapke maine jab Muskan ji se baat hui thi toh unse maine yeh pucha tha ki madam yeh aisa ho jayega aapne kaha maine kaha unhone ₹5000 lagte hai but sir main aapka isi paise mein kara dungi.
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: Sir ₹5000 nahi lagte hai uske uski ₹10000 plus GST costing hoti hai ek saal ki. Mujhe nahi pata madam kya lagta hai mujhe toh pata hai kya main woh bol raha hu. Abhi is tarah se false commitment karke logo ko paisa thagna uske baad phir comment nahi sir ab nahi hoga aapko ₹10000 lagenge yeh koi tarika hai. Is tarah se action hongi sir. Jo cheez hai woh hai. Aapke woh employee badal jaate hai aadhe se jyada employee badal jaate hai comment kuch kar jaate hai aur bhag jaate hai ab main kisko pakadta phirunga. Pichli baar bhi yahi hui thi kahani woh ek koi ladka tha pichli baar kaun assign hua tha aap dekh sakte hai account mein woh jaise hi usne paisa liya uske baad naukri chod di main samne waha hu. Maine kaam chod diya. Ab bhai meri toh communication tumse ho raha hai tum mujhe comment kar rahe ho uske baad keh rahe ho maine job chod di ab main kisko pakadne jau kaun sunega meri. Is type ke madam itne jyada over hai mujhe toh yeh lag raha hai aapki company chal kaise rahi hai main toh samajh nahi pa raha hu. Itna jyada aaj ke yug mein madam itna jyada customer disfaction hona. Isliye chal rahi hai tumhare jaise bhi log baithe hai sir sab ek jaise haath ki paanch ungli ek jaisi nahi hai na sir. Toh theek hai mujhe sare log aise hi mile. Agar hame pata chal raha hai toh. Nahi sir aisa nahi hai ab accha insaan bhi mil raha hai sir don't worry. Main definitely is cheez pe action lungi aur aapke support karne ke liye sir main abhi ke abhi call arrange kara deti hu, theek hai? Aur agar aapke liye call se satisfy honge toh please aapke paas feedback mere liye bhi jayega give a feedback on satisfy. Thank you so much. Okay madam. Thank you madam. Himani main ek case de rahi hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting worth from IndiaMART.

- Account settings not done after subscription.

- Account manager gave personal number, then blocked customer.

- False commitments made regarding API integration.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the issues faced.

- Account manager changed to Himani.

- WhatsApp group created with customer, executive, and Himani.

- Clarified that IndiaMART does not provide API.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will arrange a call with Himani.



Alert (If Any):

complaint

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- account settings, api, customer support, subscription, worth
